Package com.dtsx.astra.sdk.utils

Class HttpClientWrapper

java.lang.Object
com.dtsx.astra.sdk.utils.HttpClientWrapper
public class HttpClientWrapper extends Object
Helper to forge Http Requests to interact with Devops API.
